descriptions.index: Firas Al Alam is a licensed psychologist specializing in the management of ADHD symptoms and associated difficulties, including problems of inattention, memory, emotion regulation, planning and organization.
descriptions.about: Read more about who I am and my professional background.
descriptions.clinical-approach: I adopt a person-centered framework and use CBT techniques personalized for each client.
descriptions.contact: Contact me for more information or to book your online session now.
descriptions.pricing: Transparent pricing adapted to your financial situation.

legal.title: Legal
legal.license-details: This website is licensed under the GPL-3.0 license

404.sorry: Sorry, this page does not exist.

contact.paragraph-1: You can contact me directly through various means. If you prefer a traditional approach, feel free to give me a call at [phone number]. The best time to contact me is Monday-Friday from 9am til 5pm.
contact.paragraph-2: Alternatively, you can reach out to me via email at [email address], or via Telegram or Whatsapp at +961 xx xxxxxx.
contact.paragraph-3: If you prefer a more structured approach, I have also provided a contact form on this page. You can fill out the form with your details, including your preferred method of contact, and a brief description of your concerns. Once submitted, the form will be sent directly to me.
contact.address: 1234 Street address, Region goes here, Beirut

Hero.header-1: Firas Al Alam is a licensed psychologist, specializing in the management of ADHD symptoms and associated difficulties
Hero.header-2: including problems of inattention, memory, emotion regulation, planning, and organization.
Hero.desc: Get in contact, or book your appointment below
